title: France 1-1 Turkey, RESULT: World champions held in Paris as Cristiano Ronaldo scores 700th goal
text:
France and Portugal are among a number of teams who can book their spot at Euro 2020 next summer on a busy night of qualifying action across the continent.

The world champions will be through to the finals if they collect another three points against Turkey, who will also qualify if they secure victory and Iceland endure a disastrous result by failing to beat Andorra.

Elsewhere, Portugal can also also reach Euro 2020 where they will look to defend their status as European champions if they win in Ukraine and group rivals Serbia fail to match their result in Lithuania. With seven matches all getting underway from 7.45pm BST, follow all the action here.
description: France and Portugal are among a number of teams who can book their spot at Euro 2020 next summer on a busy night of qualifying action across the continent. Follow all the action as it happens.
